overview: Tempting The Tackling Dummy: Xander Corvus is desperate to make the ZZ College football team, but his athletic ability leaves much to be desired. So, he's enlisted the help of renowned trainer Nina Elle, who happens to be a horny, busty MILF, to whip him into shape before training camp.  Nina's Chapel of Lust Part 2: In part 2 of Nina's Chapel of Lust, our favorite mature MILF is at it again, but this time she's found a willing participant in bride-to-be Jillian Janson. Scavenger Hump: Van Wylde has come to stay at Raven Hart's quaint B&B, but he's not quite prepared for how this sexy MILF likes to tease her guests.  Hot & Sweaty Day: It's a scorcher outside and the heat is unbearable for Cory Chase and her neighbor Damon Dice.  Lisa's Pool Boy Toy: Bumbling pool boy Jordi is having a hard time focusing on his tasks with Lisa Ann's boyfriend's daughter teasing him by the water.
title: Cougar Sightings 8
